posts.post_title: FS: Signed c.1890s G.Waldon Smith Cabinet of Ed McKean PSA EX-MT 6 (MK) Jake Virtue C
posts.post_content:
FS: Signed c.1890s G. Waldon Smith Cabinet of Ed McKean of the Cleveland Spiders PSA EX-MT 6 (MK) - From the Jake Virtue Collection.

Price:SOLD!
Payment: Venmo or PayPal. FF payment preferred but G&S payment is fine as well.
Thanks guys. It's a great cabinet but I bought it on a whim and it doesn't really fit with the direction my collection is going. Listed under my cost.
Such a great image. Love his uniform.
